mapper.insert: insert into animal_fileupload(fno, uuid, uploadpath, uploaddate, fileName, filetype, board_num) values (seq_animal_file.nextval, #{uuid}, #{uploadPath},sysdate, #{fileName}, #{fileType}, #{board_num})
mapper.select: select * from animal_fileupload where uploadpath = to_char(sysdate -1, 'yyyy\\mm\\dd')
